about_the_game:
Magic Pussy: Chapter 3 is a prequel to our well-known series, so no prior knowledge of the previous games is necessary to enjoy it. Matter of fact, if you’re new to the series - this is the perfect place to start!

We’ve decided to go above and beyond this time and to drastically improve every aspect of the game - it now offers various routes to go down and paths to explore, and your decisions influence things more than you can imagine - you weave your own little story.

You take on the role of Percival, a redhead heartthrob coming into Wisterwood village with his friends to thwart the ancient cult shenanigans and find their artifacts. Simultaneously, you meet and get to know locals, help them with their own little misfortunes, visit local events and various beautiful locations - the new chapter’s vastly larger in scope than the previous ones!

Features:
  • Exceptional adult animation - no more short looping segments, this time we’ve got full-blown animated sequences with beginnings, pose changes and endings.
  • Speaking of endings - CUM! You’ve asked for it - we’re delivering it. And we’re delivering a lot of it!
  • Stunning graphics - we’re using a new engine, and our skills have grown too, so this time the game looks even better than before!
  • Open-world - day/night cycle, various locations and freedom of movement.
  • Characters - now with more emotions, different outfits and freedom of movement around the village.
  • Immense scope - the demo version is already 2 times bigger than the whole Chapter 2, and it’s barely 1/5 of the game - we’ve got a lot of content, and that's a promise.
  • Branching plot - your choices make a difference! Experience your unique story - you choose where to go, how to approach different situations and people whom you make friends (and more!) with.
  • Diversity - our players asked us to include gay, lesbian, group and similar types of content - and we did! There’s now optional content to suit everyone's tastes.

    Dive into an open-world adventure featuring many characters and places, an intriguing plot filled with both main and side quests, mini-games, card collectables and lengthy, detailed animations with exceptional graphical quality - we’re pushing the envelope this time!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content that may not be appropriate for all ages or for viewing at work. Specifically, it includes depictions of sexual acts, revealing outfits, nudity, sex animations, BDSM, masturbation and stepsibling relationships all of which are portrayed graphically. These elements are integral to the storyline and character development within the game, contributing to the overall narrative experience. All characters in the game are over the age of 18.

name: Magic Pussy: Chapter 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X compatible
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Magic Pussy is back - get ready for a long story with many choices, animation quality never seen before, new characters, old friends and lots of cum - and we mean it! Jump into an immersive visual novel filled with an enchanting atmosphere and passion - Wisterwood is ready to open its secrets to you
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
